announcements.title: Intro to Spirituality at CPC
announcements.description: New Class during Sunday Lunch in CPC Lecture Room | March 23-April 13 Have questions about CPC and why we do the things we do? Want to hear more about our spirituality and vision for the Christian life? Want to explore with others what it's like to experience Christ at CPC? These questions and more will be addressed in four 45 minute sessions starting March 23, and will include teaching, discussion, and open Q&A. All are welcome! Grab your lunch and join us in the lecture room!

announcements.title: Women's Discipleship Group | Megan Hill's devotional of contentment
announcements.description: Ladies -Are you interested in joining with other women to dig into your faith, to come alongside, to challenge and encourage one another in Christ? The evening Women's Discipleship Group will be working through Megan Hill's devotional on contentment for the next several months. We meet via Googlemeets the 1st and 3rd Mondays of each month at 7:30pm. For more information contact Lisa Graham lisahgraham44@gmail.com or Diane Miller auntie.diane@comcast.net

announcements.title: Spring Work Day | April 12
announcements.description: Join your church family as we take care of our grounds and building. This is a (surprisingly fun!) time of service and fellowship, as we do the church's version of Spring cleaning. This is the second of only two work days each year. There will be projects available for all skill levels!

announcements.title: Easter Fellowship Meals | Sign up now to Host or Join
announcements.description: Easter In-Home Fellowship Meals are returning, April 20 at various times and locations. Easter is an opportunity for us to celebrate the risen king as a family. What better way to do this than sitting around a table with family and friends giving thanks to Jesus for his wonderful gift of salvation? Sign up now to host or join others in the congregation for an Easter meal. All are welcome!

announcements.title: Easter Egg Hunt
announcements.description: Join us for an Easter Egg Hunt on April 19 at 11am outside on the lawn. All children are welcome to participate!

announcements.title: Young Adults Hike | May 3rd
announcements.description: Come enjoy fellowship in the outdoors with a group hike at "Bluff Head Preserve" in Guilford. We will do about a 1-mile loop, but there are options to go farther for those who prefer a longer hike. If you need a ride or want to caravan there, meet at CPC at 11:15 a.m. Otherwise we will meet at the parking lot at 12:00 p.m directly off Durham Road. Contact Josh S. at joshuatsanders@yahoo.com with any questions.

announcements.title: Good Friday Service | April 18th
announcements.description: Join us for our Good Friday Service on April 18 at 6:30pm. This is a special time of reflection and worship as we remember Christ's sacrifice. Bring a friend or family member to experience this meaningful service together.

announcements.title: Congregational Meeting | May 4th
announcements.description: All are welcome to join our annual spring family meeting, as we look back to what God has done in our midst this year, and consider how God is leading us into the future. We will discuss the survey results, among other topics.

Meet on the upper part by the picnic tables. Please sign up to bring something for the potluck. If you need a ride from the church, contact joshuatsanders@yahoo.com (951-813-6521).
